title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo—fast, self-contained way to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs locally with a single CLI and Docker support.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chatting, pulling, creating and deleting models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers to integrate local Ollama models into web or server apps.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama as a first-class LLM provider inside LangChain for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web interface (React) that talks to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI (Rust) with syntax highlighting, chat history and model-switching shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair-programmer inside your editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for generative question-answering & retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference repo showing how to build a private RAG stack with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets server members chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive and Kotlin-coroutine clients; published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community library that wraps the Ollama REST API with strongly-typed models and async enumerables.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles (Llava, CodeLlama-70B-Instruct, SQLCoder, etc.) ready to import into Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop app (Rust + React) for chatting with Ollama models on Windows, macOS & Linux.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm ideas or translate text using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run LLM-based tests or code reviews.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash commands to query local models privately within your workspace.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot (Python) with group chat support, per-user model selection and conversation memory using Ollama.
